title: Enu dhanyaLO lakumi
sahitya:
Enu dhanyaLO lakumi enthA mAnyaLO sAnurAgadinda hariya tAne sEve mADutihaLu


caraNam 1    kOTi kOTi bhrtyariralu hATakAmbarana sEve sATiyillada pUjegaLanu dhATiyinda mADutihaLu
    caraNam 2    chatra cAmara vyajana pariyanka pAtra rUpadalli nintu citra caritanAda hariya nitya sEve mADutihaLu
    caraNam 3    sarva sthaLadi vyAptanAda sarva dOSa rahitanAda garuDa gamananAda purandara viTTalana sEvisuvaLu
